section.p: The complaint that dispatch reported to the responding unit

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11467 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.74"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11187)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10568)/@code="67570-2" Chief complaint per dispatch Reported.dispatch (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10569)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10571), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Dispatch Reason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.49 DYNAMIC (CONF:10570)
NEMSIS Trace: EDispatch.01
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11187)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10568)/@code="67570-2" Chief complaint per dispatch Reported.dispatch (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10569)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10571), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Dispatch Reason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.49 DYNAMIC (CONF:10570)
NEMSIS Trace: EDispatch.01

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.74" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67570-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Chief complaint per dispatch Reported.dispatch"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
